name: Beaf – Photo Comparison Block
author: Gutenbergkits

sections.description:
Beaf is a custom Gutenberg Block based plugin that is developed with Gutenberg Native Components. You can easily showcase the Photo Comparison. It comes with different styles and settings so that you can easily customize it as per your needs. It is a lite version of Beaf Pro. To get more features and options, you can check the Beaf Pro.

Overview

  • See Demos
  • Get Beaf Pro

Key Features

  • Simple, light-weight, and super-fast
  • Built with only Gutenberg Native Components
  • No Block Builder at all
  • 100% Responsive
  • Horizontal & Vertical View
  • Images Comparison Options
    • Before & After Label
    • Comparison start on Hover
    • Horizontal & Vertical Comparison
  • Easy to Use in Gutenberg Editor
  • Drag & Drop Use
  • No jQuery dependency

Beaf Pro features

  • 3 Content Types (Image, Video, Iframe – Google Map)
  • Custom Label Styles
  • Custom Label Position
  • Custom Label Typography
  • Labels Animation Options
  • Custom Comparison Starting Point
  • Custom Comparison Line
  • Custom Comparison Line Color
  • Custom Comparison Line Thickness
  • Custom Caption for beaf slider

Beaf Pro is a premium version of Beaf. You can get more features and options in Beaf Pro. Get Beaf Pro
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/image-compare-block directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Simply go to Gutenberg Block Editor and you will find a new block at Media Category named “Image Compare”
  4. Drag and drop to use it.
sections.faq:
What is Beaf Slider?

Beaf slider means Before and After Slider. It is a slider that showcases the before and after comparison between two images, videos, or iframes.

What is Beaf Pro?

Beaf Pro is a premium version of Beaf. You can get more features and options in Beaf Pro. Get Beaf Pro

How to upgrade to Beaf Pro?

Beaf Pro is the premium version of Beaf and it comes with a complete set of features and options. It is completely a separate plugin. You can simply deactivate the Beaf and install Beaf Pro. Then, you can start using it.

Is it compatible with the latest WordPress version?

Yes, it is compatible with the latest WordPress version.

Is it responsive?

Sure, it is 100% Responsive

Have you used any block builder?

No, it is built with 100% Gutenberg Native Components only.

How can I use it?

Please follow the video tutorial to see the uses of it.
